product_name: Novara Bike Heart Bike T-Shirt - Women's
long_description: Slip on the women's Novara Bike Heart Bike T-Shirt for enjoyable rides from home to the coffee shop, farmer's market and all stops in between. 100% cotton crew-neck tee is soft and breathable for comfort on warm days. Length is slightly longer for coverage on the bike; fit is not too loose or too tight. Reflective logo on left sleeve enhances visibility in low light. Novara Bike Heart Bike T-Shirt features a unique Novara graphic.
short_description: Slip on the women's Novara Bike Heart Bike T-Shirt for enjoyable rides from home to the coffee shop, farmer's market and all stops in between.
